I love my crazy, goofy, stupid, gorgeous, weird, lame, socially challenged friends. Happy friendship day!
Love is blind; friendship tries not to notice. Happy friendship day!
If you have friends as weird as you, then you have everything. Happy friendship day!
I don’t know what’s tighter, our jeans or our friendship! Happy friendship day!
My friend, remember that without stupidity there wouldn’t be intelligence, and without ugliness, there wouldn’t be beautiful, so the world needs you after all. Happy friendship day!
Knowledge cannot replace friendship. I’d rather be an idiot than lose you. Happy friendship day!
I love my crazy, goofy, stupid, gorgeous, weird, lame, socially challenged friends. Happy friendship day!
Friends give you a shoulder to cry on. But best friends are ready with a shovel to hurt the person that made you cry.
If you can survive 11 days in cramped quarters with a friend and come out laughing, your friendship is the real deal.
I like you most because you are always there to join in my weirdness. Happy friendship day!
Sometimes I think, ‘What is a friend?’ Then I say, ‘Friend is someone to share the last cookie with.’
Friendship is like peeing in your pants. Everyone can see it, but only you can feel a warm feeling inside.
Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them. Happy friendship day!
Friends: people who borrow my books and set wet glasses on them. Happy friendship day to all stupid like this!
Friendship is a little more trust, A little less try, A little more laugh, And a little less cry, A little more WE and a little less I. Happy Friendship Day!
The holy passion of Friendship is so sweet and steady and loyal and enduring a nature that it will last through a whole lifetime, if not asked to lend money.
Friendship is a knot tied by angels’ hands. Happy friendship day!
Came but for friendship, and took away love. Happy friendship day!
The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it. Happy friendship day to you!
What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies. Happy friendship day my dear!
Friends and good manners will carry you where money won’t go. Best wishes to you!
A friend is one of the best things you can be and the greatest things you can have.
Friendship is a long journey through the hills and valleys of life. Happy friendship day!
One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them… your smile, your hope, and your courage. Happy friendship day!
Friends are the most important ingredient in the recipe called life. Have the best friendship day ever!
A friend who understands your tears is much more valuable than a lot of friends who only know your smile.
No matter who broke your heart or how long it takes to heal, you will never get through it without your friends.
Friends pick us up when we fall down, and if they can’t pick us up, they lie down and listen for a while.
Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend. Happy friendship day!
Dear best friend, if you die before me and you are at those pearly gates, ask if you can bring a friend. I’m always there for you. Happy friendship day!
Never shall I forget the days I spent with you. Continue to be my friend, as you will always find me yours.
We’re not perfect, We laugh too hard, We’re way too loud and we make complete fools of ourselves but doing it together makes us Best friends forever!
Best friends loan out DVDs knowing that they’ll never be seen again.
Everyone hears what you say. Friends listen to what you say. Best friends listen to what you don’t say.
I believe in angels, the kind that heaven sends. I’m surrounded by angels, and I call them my best friends.
A circle is round, it has no ends, that’s how long I want to be your best friend. Happy friendship day!
A good friend knows all your stories. A best friend helped you write them. Happy friendship day!
Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand. Happy friendship day!
Sitting next to you doing absolutely nothing means absolutely everything to me. Happy friendship day!
Best friends are the people in your life who make you laugh louder, smile brighter and live better.
When it hurts to look back and you’re afraid to look ahead, you can look beside you and your best friend will be there.
Best friends understand when you say forget it. Wait forever when you say just a minute. Stay when you say leave me alone. And open the door before you can say come in.
Look! This selfie is totally incomplete without you. Please, come back soon! I can’t wait to take so many new selfies with you! Happy friendship day!
I miss you. A little too much, a little too often, and a little more every day. Happy friendship day!
The only thing stopping me from feeling blue, are all the selfies I took with you. Happy friendship day! I miss you.
I love my best friends they are the best and always will be! No matter if we are side by side or miles apart friends are forever close to our heart! Happy Friendship Day!
You’re everything I’ve ever wanted in a best friend. When you are with me, time just flies away. When you are not here, even seconds seem like days. On this friendship day, I’m missing you so much.
Our selfies are not just pictures that we took together. They are the priceless memories that keep me sane when you’re not here. I miss you. Happy friendship day!
Our friendship is genuine and strong. It is as true as the sun rises every single day. I miss you. Happy friendship day!
I have no regrets. Life tore us apart but I’m glad I had the chance to call you my friend. I miss you. Happy friendship day!
To be a best friend doesn’t take much, a shoulder, an ear, some understanding, and not even have to say a word to make you smile. Missing you. Happy Friendship Day.
If I could write a book right now, it would be titled 1000 ways to miss your BFF. Happy friendship day! I miss you. Happy friendship day!
Miles don’t influence our friendship because love for you is always in my heart. Happy friendship day! I miss you!
Even though you are just a post away on Facebook and a tweet away on Twitter… I wish you could just be a hug away in real life. Happy friendship day! I miss you.
